DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Telephone counseling may help reduce depression anxiety improve well-being quality life cervical cancer survivor . PURPOSE : This randomized clinical trial study well psychosocial support work African-American , Latina-American , European-American cervical cancer survivor .
DOC.brief_title: Psychosocial Support African-American , Latina-American , European-American Cervical Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . To evaluate utility 6 telephone session ( low intensity : LiTx ) 8 telephone session ( high intensity : HiTx ) plus Survivorship Booklet design educate improve awareness physical psychological impact cancer increase knowledge appropriate medical psychosocial resource woman cervical cancer . II . To evaluate utility telephone session ( LiTx HiTx ) design improve psychological functioning ( decrease depression anxiety ) woman cervical cancer . III . To evaluate utility telephone session ( LiTx HiTx ) design improve social functioning ( family support communication ) . OUTLINE : Patients clinically assign 1 2 group . GROUP I : Patients receive survivorship booklet mail contain information cervical cancer . Patients receive follow-up telephone call 3 month clarify issue relevant survivorship booklet . GROUP II : Patients randomly assign receive either 6 8 weekly telephone session address manage medical issue , health education , cancer resource ; balance emotion manage stress ; cop skill problem solving ; family social concern ; relational , intimacy , sexual concern ; financial employment concern . Patients also receive survivorship booklet group I .
DOC.criteria: Within 6 month 3 year cervical cancer diagnosis Diagnosed stage 13 invasive cervical cancer Not diagnose another type cancer No major disable medical psychiatric condition Survivors within 6 month 3 year post diagnosis include Participants must able read and/or speak either English Spanish Women exclude base type treatment receive cervical cancer history diagnosis mild depression anxiety Exclusion Criteria : Women metastatic disease Women major medical condition ( e.g. , stroke degenerative illness ) Survivors moderate severe depression anxiety Asian participant Stage 0 disease
